alert.note: Alert for Lee (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued July 31 at 6:17AM EDT until August 01 at 8:00AM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a Flood Advisory for the following rivers in Kentucky... Kentucky River at Heidelberg affecting Lee County. ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING TO TOMORROW MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Kentucky River at Heidelberg. * WHEN...From this morning to tomorrow morning. * IMPACTS...At 20.0 feet, Low lying areas flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 5:45 AM EDT Sunday the stage was 19.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall to 14.2 feet Thursday evening. - Action stage is 16.0 feet. - Flood stage is 20.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. The next statement will be issued 5 pm EDT.
